name: Docusaurus GitHub Pages CI(パス/ラベル条件) 最小
description: PRプレビューは docs/** 等の変更時のみ実行し、さらに 'deploy-preview' ラベルで明示制御できる最小構成。main pushは常に本番デプロイ。

---
id: intro
slug: /

# {{title}}

PRラベルや変更パスでプレビューを最小実行するCI例です。

name: Deploy Docusaurus (Advanced Filters)

concurrency:
  group: pages
  cancel-in-progress: true

on:
  push:
    branches: [ main ]
    paths:
      - 'docs/**'
      - 'docusaurus.config.js'
      - 'sidebars.js'
      - 'package.json'
      - 'src/**'
  pull_request:
    branches: [ main ]
    paths:
      - 'docs/**'
      - 'docusaurus.config.js'
      - 'sidebars.js'
      - 'package.json'
      - 'src/**'
  workflow_dispatch: {}

permissions:
  contents: read
  pages: write
  id-token: write

jobs:
  build:
    runs-on: ubuntu-latest
    if: github.event_name == 'push' || contains(toJson(github.event.pull_request.labels), 'deploy-preview')
    steps:
      - uses: actions/checkout@v4
      - uses: actions/setup-node@v4
        with:
          node-version: 20
      - run: npm ci
      - run: npm run build
      - uses: actions/upload-pages-artifact@v3
        with:
          path: build
  deploy:
    needs: build
    if: needs.build.result == 'success'
    runs-on: ubuntu-latest
    environment: ${{ github.event_name == 'pull_request' && 'github-pages-preview' || 'github-pages' }}
    steps:
      - id: deployment
        uses: actions/deploy-pages@v4
        with:
          preview: ${{ github.event_name == 'pull_request' }}
